q: pieces including a statue of King Tutankhamun have been stolen from the Egyptian museum in Cairo's Tahrir Square, Egypt's minister of state for antiquities Zahi Hawass said on Sunday. The objects stolen by looters include a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess and parts of "a gilded wood statue of Tutankhamun harpooning," a statement on Zahi Hawass ' website read.
